Summary

I enjoy helping organizations continuously improve, by helping to build an environment where collaboration is used to solve problems. I help mentor, teach, facilitate, and be a change agent both within the team and the organization.

As an Agile coach I have helped organizations transform and implement Scrum and Kanban along with DevOps principles and practices. Along with helping clients, I have managed and help grow other coaches in the practice and was heavily involved in sales engineering, and managing the P&L.

As a coach in this organization I helped them see the value of delivering sooner. I also guided them in ways to shift towards newer technologies that would allow them to continue to deliver value and avoid the need to completely stop to do a rewrite.

Senior Software Developer & Team Lead

The usage information from meters was feed into a billing system and invoices were generated for customers. Additionally, the meter usage information was used to generate reports that showed consumption data and trends. While on this project, I acted in a dual role of Team Lead and Architect. I was responsible for working through requirements and ensuring that the development team had a clear understanding and implemented the feature correctly. I also helped the team move to adoption of the Scrum framework with the goal of developing a better product for the client, business stakeholders, and engagement of the development team.
